item.title: 卢拉即将上任的党魁誓言放弃自己的观点，支持哈达德的计划
item.description: 即将上任的巴西执政党下议院领导人承诺将放弃其党团所拥护的激进观点，支持财政部长费尔南多-哈达德的经济议程，他认为该议程的成功对于总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦在 2026 年的连任机会至关重要。【原文：The incoming leader of Brazil’s ruling party in the lower house is promising to let go of the more radical views embraced by his group and rally behind Finance Minister Fernando Haddad’s economic agenda, whose success he considers crucial for President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s reelection chances in 2026.】

item.title: 三井住友希望深化与杰富瑞的合作，进军全球市场
item.description: 三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.）首席执行官表示，该公司正寻求扩大与杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.）的联盟，有可能在股票交易等新领域开展合作，以建立其全球业务。【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. is looking to expand its alliance with Jefferies Financial Group Inc., possibly working together in new areas such as equity trading to build up its global business, according to the bank’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: 尼日利亚大米价格飙升至创纪录水平，因为蒂努布的粮食政策失效了
item.description: 今年，制作尼日利亚人最喜爱的乔洛夫米饭的一种关键原料的价格上涨了一倍多，创下了历史新高，这表明尼日利亚政府在控制这个非洲人口最多的国家所面临的生活成本危机方面举步维艰。【原文：The price for a key ingredient to make Nigeria’s favorite jollof rice dish more than doubled to a record this year, showing the government’s struggle in controlling the cost-of-living crisis facing Africa’s most populous nation.】

item.title: 向优步出售台湾业务受阻，外卖英雄下跌 9
item.description: 在台湾阻止将其子公司出售给优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Delivery Hero SE shares fell the most in two weeks in the first day of trading after Taiwan blocked the sale of its subsidiary there to Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 普京怀疑能否达成新过境协议，欧洲天然气跳涨
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）进一步怀疑是否有可能达成一项协议，以维持经由乌克兰向欧洲输送天然气之后，欧洲天然气价格有所上涨。【原文：European natural gas advanced after Russian President Vladimir Putin cast further doubt on the likelihood of a deal to maintain flows to Europe via Ukraine.】

item.title: 欧洲股市本周将小幅上扬；送货英雄下滑
item.description: 圣诞假期后恢复交易的欧洲股市保持窄幅震荡，有望实现小幅周涨幅。【原文：European stocks kept to a narrow range as they resumed trading after the Christmas break, poised for modest weekly gains.】

item.title: 大幅降息、会议减少，分析师重写土耳其利率之路
item.description: 在周四的降息幅度超过预期之后，分析师们目前预计土耳其央行将在 2025 年的每次政策会议上大幅降息，尽管官员们告诫要避免不间断的宽松周期。【原文：Analysts are now expecting the Turkish central bank to deliver sizable interest-rate cuts at every policy meeting in 2025 following Thursday’s bigger-than-expected reduction, despite officials cautioning against an uninterrupted easing cycle.】

item.title: 当地农民陷入困境，中国对牛肉进口展开调查
item.description: 中国商务部周五表示，中国已开始对牛肉进口情况进行调查，以确定从海外进口的牛肉数量激增是否对国内牛肉业造成了损害。【原文：China has started a probe into beef imports, to decide if a surge in shipments from overseas has hurt the domestic sector, the Ministry of Commerce said Friday.】

item.title: 经营汽车制造商长达五十年的铃木治去世，享年 94 岁
item.description: 铃木大作（Osamu Suzuki）逝世，他在数十年间经营着以微型车和摩托车闻名的铃木汽车公司，并推动了公司的全球扩张。享年 94 岁。【原文：Osamu Suzuki, who ran Suzuki Motor Corp., known for its minicars and motorcycles, across several decades and drove the company’s global expansion, has died. He was 94.】

item.title: 日产巨额收购为银行家在日本并购热潮中的下一场战斗埋下伏笔
item.description: 日本今年创纪录的交易活动并没有给外国公司带来多少节日的欢乐：目前，这一领域仍主要由当地的大型银行和与企业界关系密切的律师事务所主导。【原文：Japan’s record dealmaking activity this year isn’t giving foreign firms much holiday cheer: For now, the field remains mostly dominated by the local megabanks and law firms with deep ties to the corporate world.】

item.title: 竞争加剧，中国汽车制造商利润进一步缩水
item.description: 2024 年，中国汽车行业的利润率进一步受到挤压，因为残酷的竞争继续对实力较弱的电动汽车制造商构成威胁。【原文：Profit margins in China’s automotive industry were squeezed even further in 2024 as cut-throat competition continued to claim weaker electric vehicle makers.】

item.title: 印度卢比创 2023 年 2 月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 印度卢比创下了近两年来的最大跌幅，原因是进口商月底的美元需求拖累了印度卢比。【原文：The Indian rupee fell the most in almost two years as month-end dollar demand by importers weighed on the currency.】

item.title: 日产汽车股价将创八月市场暴跌以来最大跌幅
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co. Ltd.）的股价有望创下自8月份大跌以来的最大跌幅，原因是市场猜测该汽车制造商计划与本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co. Ltd.）进行的交易的股份转让比例。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. shares are on track for their biggest plunge since an August selloff, amid speculation about the share transfer ratio for the carmaker’s planned deal with Honda Motor Co.】

item.title: 乘车服务独角兽公司 InDrive 投资巴基斯坦杂货初创公司 Krave Mart
item.description: 乘车服务独角兽公司inDrive对巴基斯坦杂货配送初创公司Krave Mart进行了战略投资，这也是该公司在新兴市场寻找机会的努力之一。【原文：Ride-hailing unicorn inDrive has made a strategic investment in Pakistan’s grocery delivery startup Krave Mart, part of an effort to explore opportunities in emerging markets.】

item.title: 泰国政府影响中央银行的努力遭遇挫折
item.description: 泰国政府向泰国央行施压要求降息的行动遭遇了重大挫折，国务委员会办公室实际裁定正式提名的主席人选--前财政部长吉滴拉-纳-拉农（Kittiratt Na-Ranong）--并不合适。【原文：The Thai government’s campaign to pressure the Bank of Thailand to cut interest rates suffered a significant setback, with the Office of the Council of State effectively ruling that the official nominee to be chairman, former finance minister Kittiratt Na-Ranong, is not suitable.】

item.title: 土耳其希望在振兴叙利亚石油和天然气开发中发挥作用
item.description: 土耳其表示希望帮助提高叙利亚的石油和天然气产量，这是安卡拉为更深入地参与这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的重建而采取的最新举措。【原文：Turkey said it wants to help increase oil and natural gas production in Syria, the latest step in Ankara’s overtures for deeper involvement in the reconstruction of the war-torn country.】

item.title: 中国红利 ETF 资金流激增，投资者不再投资债券
item.description: 随着2024年的临近，中国投资者正加倍看好红利股，流入追踪这一主题的两只最大交易所交易基金的资金创下了历史新高。【原文：Chinese investors are doubling down on dividend stocks as 2024 draws to a close, with flows into a pair of the largest exchange-traded funds tracking the theme hitting a record.】

item.title: 交易商担心中国需求，铁矿石创五周新低
item.description: 铁矿石跌至五个多星期以来的最低点，跌破每吨 100 美元，原因是中国工业利润不佳，凸显了中国经济的疲软，尽管钢厂的业绩确实有所改善。【原文：Iron ore sank to the lowest in more than five weeks — dipping below $100 a ton — as poor industrial profits in China highlighted the nation’s economic weakness, although mills’ performance did improve.】

item.title: 鱿鱼游戏》在韩国因 Netflix 新一季停播而股价下跌
item.description: Netflix 公司的大片系列剧《乌贼游戏》（Squid Game）新一季的首播不尽如人意，导致相关韩国公司的股价周五大幅下跌。【原文：A less-than-perfect debut for the new season of Netflix Inc.’s blockbuster series Squid Game sent shares of related South Korean companies sharply lower Friday.】

item.title: 鬼灵精偷走了 Nifty 的节日欢乐
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印尼银行持有债券市场 25% 的股份引发流动性担忧
item.description: 随着印尼央行将债务持有量提高到创纪录的水平，印尼投资者对该国债券市场的潜在压力越来越警惕。【原文：Investors in Indonesia are growing increasingly wary about potential stress in the nation’s bond markets as the central bank ramps up debt holdings to record levels.】

item.title: 中国工业利润将出现 2000 年以来最大年度降幅
item.description: 11 月份，中国工业企业利润连续第四个月下降，有望创下自 2000 年有记录以来的最大年度降幅。【原文：China’s industrial firms saw their profits drop in November for a fourth straight month, on track for the sharpest annual decline since records began in 2000.】

item.title: 日本内阁批准创纪录预算案，考验领导人石破茂
item.description: 日本内阁为 2025 年 4 月开始的财政年度批准了创纪录的 115.5 万亿日元（约合 7,320 亿美元）预算，这对首相石破茂领导的少数派政府能否让议会批准该提案是一个关键考验。【原文：Japan’s cabinet approved a record ¥115.5 trillion ($732 billion) budget for the fiscal year starting April 2025, setting up the minority government of Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba for a key test of its longevity in getting the proposal approved by parliament.】

item.title: 中国债券创十年来最佳回报率，预计将有更多涨幅
item.description: 中国政府债券将迎来十年来最好的一年，当地基金经理和策略师预测 2025 年将有更多收益。【原文：Chinese government bonds are primed for their best year in a decade, with local fund managers and strategists predicting more gains for 2025.】

item.title: 比特币涨势渐弱，代币破纪录的一年即将结束
item.description: 在数字资产创纪录的一年的最后几天里，比特币的涨势正在消退，因为投资者正在评估当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币行业的支持所带来的剩余动力。【原文：A Bitcoin rally is fizzling in the final days of a record-breaking year for the digital asset, as investors assess the remaining impetus from President-elect Donald Trump’s embrace of the cryptocurrency sector.】

item.title: 美国就业数据未提供美联储加息路径线索，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 在美国好坏参半的失业救济数据几乎没有改变对美联储降息前景的押注之后，黄金在节后平静的交易中持稳。【原文：Gold was steady in quiet, post-holiday trading, after mixed jobless claims data in the US did little to alter bets on the outlook for Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 日本央行释放信号：1 月加息仍在讨论之中，争论激烈
item.description: 日本央行在上周的政策会议上表示，即使多数人的谨慎观点动摇了按兵不动的决定，但下个月加息的可能性仍然存在。【原文：The Bank of Japan signaled that a rate hike next month still remains on the table even as cautious views among the majority swayed the stand-pat decision at a policy meeting last week.】

item.title: 日本电产出价 16 亿美元收购牧野铣削公司
item.description: 日本电产株式会社提出以约 2573 亿日元（16 亿美元）的价格收购牧野铣床株式会社，这可能是日本电产最大的收购案之一。【原文：Nidec Corp. has offered to acquire Makino Milling Machine Co. for about ¥257.3 billion ($1.6 billion), initiating potentially one of its largest takeovers.】

item.title: 补贴暂时取消，东京通胀加速
item.description: 由于政府暂时取消了公用事业补贴，东京的通货膨胀在 12 月份连续第二个月加速，这一结果可能会支持明年加息的预期。【原文：Inflation in Tokyo accelerated for a second month in December, as the government temporarily phased out utility subsidies, a result that will likely support expectations of an interest rate hike next year.】

item.title: 临近年末，石油价格下跌，交易商思考 2025 年前景
item.description: 在年末清淡的交易中，原油价格一路下滑，投资者在追踪中东局势发展的同时，也在评估原油 2025 年的前景。【原文：Oil drifted in thin end-of-year trading, with investors assessing crude’s outlook for 2025 while tracking developments in the Middle East.】
